sentence.Network_en: On the radio I caught Mr Hague's concluding remarks at the Blackpool conference.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在收音机中听到了黑格先生在布莱克浦会议上的总结发言。

sentence.Network_en: His only vice is to get drunk on champagne after concluding a successful piece of business.
sentence.Network_cn: 他唯一的缺点就是在成功做成一笔生意后会大喝香槟而醉。

sentence.Network_en: Nowadays there are two ways of concluding a bourgeois marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 在今日的资产阶级中间,缔结婚姻有两种方式.

list.abs: 高中英语重点短语汇编 ... 11. be similar to 与…相似 12. to conclude 最后；总而言之 13. complain about 抱怨….

航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(C) ... concluding line 绳梯中央绳 concluding report 总结报告 conclusion of agreement 缔结协议.
3．结论句（concluding sentence）----对整个段落进行归纳总结。例如：Travel has become more and more popular(主题句).
3）结尾段（Concluding Paragraph）：对全文归纳总结。一般可采用以下四种方式对全文进行归纳：a．简明归纳全文；b．回顾主题…

entry.def: If you conclude that something is true, you decide that it is true using the facts you know as a basis.

example.ex: Larry had concluded that he had no choice but to accept Paul's words as the truth...
example.tran: 拉里断定自己别无选择，只能当保罗的话是真的。

example.ex: So what can we conclude from this debate?...
example.tran: 那么从这场辩论中我们能得出什么结论？

entry.def: When you conclude, you say the last thing that you are going to say.

example.ex: 'It's a waste of time,' he concluded...
I would like to conclude by saying that I do enjoy your magazine.
example.tran: 最后，我想说我的确很喜欢你们的杂志。

entry.def: When something concludes, or when you conclude it, you end it.

example.ex: The evening concluded with dinner and speeches...
example.tran: 这个夜晚在宴会和讲话中结束。

example.ex: The Group of Seven major industrial countries concluded its annual summit meeting today.
example.tran: 由主要工业国家组成的七国集团今天结束了其年度峰会。

entry.def: If one person or group concludes an agreement, such as a treaty or business deal, with another, they arrange it. You can also say that two people or groups conclude an agreement.

example.ex: Mexico and the Philippines have both concluded agreements with their commercial bank creditors...
example.tran: 墨西哥和菲律宾均已与商业银行债权人达成了协议。

example.ex: If the clubs cannot conclude a deal, an independent tribunal will decide.
example.tran: 如果俱乐部之间无法达成协议，将由一个独立的仲裁委员会来裁定。

means.word_mean: 1. occurring at or forming an end or termination;

sentences.sentence: "his concluding words came as a surprise"
